Pre-Game Insights: Slovakia captain Milan Skriniar has expressed confidence in his team’s strategy as they prepare to face England in the Euro 2024 round of 16 clash.
Skriniar believes that Slovakia’s cohesive teamwork can counter England’s reliance on individual brilliance.
Skriniar noted that the pressure is more on Gareth Southgate’s side, given their status and expectations.
Slovakia advanced to the knockout stage by finishing third in Group E, where all four teams ended with the same points—a first in Euros history.
England beat Serbia by a lone goal through Jude Bellingham before drawing 1-1 and 0-0 with Denmark and Slovenia to top Group C.
